info.title: Guest Vacation & Itinerary API
info.description: This documentation covers all apis and their schema model for the Itinerary Vacation Engine. The terminology used here is specific to the IVE domain. It may require domain mapper for other business terminology such as E2K or commerce.

get.summary: This end point returns all personal itineraries of the guest.
get.description: Every personal itineries can contain multiple `ItineraryEventGroup`. The ship schedule event group contains the seaport and their arrival and departure time. Guest can manage personal event group for their own activities.  The product booking event group and the cruise compass event group are managed by the commerce engine. `eventGroupType` is used to identify the type of the itinerary.

parameters.name: sailingID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the sailing (Ship + SailDate (YYYYmmDD). E.g OA20220328

parameters.description: guest ID within the cruise reservation

200.description: MyItinerary object, which contains list of calendars for the given guest

LocationTypeENUM.description: Type of the location in which a specific activity or product is offered

MyItinerary.description: Personal Itinerary of the given Cruise Reservation and guest. It lists all events scheduled for guests. Events could be based on the activities purchased/scheduled by the shopping transactions or personal appointments created by the guest themselves.

cruiseReservationID.description: Unique Reservation ID of the cruise reservation

guestID.description: My Unique ID of the guest in the reservation

sailingID.description: Unique identifier of the sailing (Ship + SailDate (YYYYmmDD). E.g OA20220328

firstName.description: My first name when adding the calendar event

lastName.description: My last name when adding the calendar event

ItineraryEventGroup.description: Grouping of the same type of itinerary event

eventGroupType.description: Type of this group (e.g. SHIPSCHEDULE, COMMERCE, CRUISECOMPASS, SELF)

eventGroupDescription.description: Event type description of this group

ItineraryEvent.description: Personal Itinerary of the given Cruise Reservation and guest. It lists all events scheduled for guests. Events could be based on the activities purchased/scheduled by the shopping transactions or personal appointments created by the guest themselves.

eventID.description: System generated event id. Used on further services calls like cancelItineraryEvent

eventType.description: Event type (actual activity type which generated the itinerary event (DINING, SHOREX, SPA etc)

eventName.description: Short name or description of the event. Originally created by the user or the source application which created the event.

eventLocale.description: language region information in BCP 47 style

EventSourceDetail.description: Source of the specific event. It covers the details like which system generated the event and its meta details

sourceSystemApplicationID.description: Original Applicatin ID (E.g COMMERCE / SELF / SHIPSCHEDULE)

sourceSystemReservationID.description: Unique Reservation ID of the source system which generated this event. Used by the clients later to perform CTA on this event.

sourceSystemOrderID.description: Unique order ID of the source system which generated this event. Used by the clients later to perform CTA on this event.

sourceSystemExternalOrderID.description: External order ID of the source system which generated this event. Used by the clients later to perform CTA on this event.

sourceSystemProductID.description: Unique ID of the product / activity on the source syste. Used to perform CTA.

sourceSystemOfferingID.description: Unique ID of the product / activity offering on the source system. Used to perform CTA.

sourceSystemProductName.description: Product Name coming from the source system.

EventAttendee.description: Details of the attendoes of a specific event

cruiseReservationID.description: Unique Reservation ID of the cruise reservation

guestID.description: Unique  ID of the guest in the reservation

sailingID.description: Unique identifier of the sailing (Ship + SailDate (YYYYmmDD). E.g OA20220328

firstName.description: First name when adding the calendar event

lastName.description: Last name when adding the calendar event

EventTime.description: Start or End time of the actual  Event

eventTimeZone.description: Reserveed for future USE. By default, all the events are on the 'ship time'

EventLocation.description: location in which a specific activity or product is offered / happenning

locationCode.description: Unique code of a specific location
